title: Mythology Worksheet
description: Documents a single myth in the world -- creation myths, end-of-world myths, or other stories involving gods and the supernatural. Each myth records both what actually happened and what inhabitants believe happened, since these often differ.

title.description: The name or title of this myth

myth_type.description: What type of myth this is

gods_involved.description: IDs of gods who feature in this myth

species_involved.description: IDs of species who feature in or are affected by this myth

what_happened.description: What actually happened -- the objective truth of events (may be unknown even to the worldbuilder)

what_inhabitants_believe.description: What the world's inhabitants believe happened -- the popular version of the myth

what_is_true.description: Which parts of the popular belief are accurate

what_is_false.description: Which parts of the popular belief are inaccurate, distorted, or fabricated

what_is_unknown.description: Facts about this myth that no one currently knows

moral_or_lesson.description: The moral or lesson inhabitants draw from this myth (if any)

cultural_impact.description: How this myth affects current culture, customs, fears, or celebrations

who_tells_it.description: Which cultures or species tell this myth, and how do different groups tell it differently?

locations_featured.description: Locations where events in this myth take place

items_featured.description: Notable items or artifacts that appear in this myth

analogue_sources.description: Earth mythological sources used as analogues (private notes, not shown to audience)

pantheon_id.description: Which pantheon this myth belongs to

x-cross-references.god-profile: Gods featured in this myth are defined in God Profiles
x-cross-references.pantheon-overview: This myth belongs to a pantheon's mythology
x-cross-references.species-profile: Species affected by this myth are defined in Species Profiles
x-cross-references.religion-profile: Religions may incorporate this myth into their teachings
x-cross-references.item-profile: Items featured in this myth may be defined in Item Profiles
